Title: Derelict Fashion
Description:
<A disgusting set of sunglasses is dripping with slime, but they look extremely expensive.

Someone is definitely missing these. This style is very hot right now.>
ObjectivesText: Find the owner of the sunglasses.
RewardText:
My sunglasses?! You expect a reward, I gather. You know the least you could have done is clean them.

<Zeldis breathes on them, then wipes them off.>

I suppose I can throw a few small coins your way.
